attributes.action: Stand down immediately and submit to a public international trial on the charges of Treason, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Treason Felony Act of 1851 (it is still in force) states that it is treason felony to move or allow foreign troops to occupy any part of the Monarch's Realm (as we now have German, Polish and French militia patrolling our streets carrying police issue weapons); to move or allow foreign Government to legislate in any part of the Monarch's realm (Lisbon Treaty), or for anyone to sanction the Monarch's constitutionally guaranteed legislative power without Her consent (Parliament Act 1911 and subsequent Acts). We would also demand that Anthony Blair stand trial for treason felony as he abolished the hereditary peers thus removing veto power from the Upper House, which was his final obstacle to moving us closer to the European Union of Socialist Republics.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
